headline: Lilly's Olumiant (baricitinib) recommended by CHMP for approval of expanded use in the European Union for adolescents with severe alopecia areata
summary: Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE: LLY) and Incyte (NASDAQ: INCY) announced today that the European Medicines Agency's (EMA) Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use (CHMP) has issued a positive opinion for Olumiant (baricitinib) for the treatment of adolescents (ages 12 to <18) with severe alopecia areata (AA). AA is a chronic immune disease that can have an especially devastating social and emotional impact on young patients and their families, as early onset AA can be more severe and lead to
